00093     // RegExp for Structure with Energy line
00094     private static final Pattern rnastructWithEnergyPattern = Pattern.compile("^[\\(\\)\\[\\]\\{\\}\\<\\>.]+?\\s+\\(?-?\\d+\\.\\d*?\\)?\\s*$");

00257     /* (non-Javadoc)
00258      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendSequencesFromSequenceML(de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.SequenceML)
00259      */
00260     public List<String> appendSequencesFromSequenceML(final SequenceML seqML) throws BioDOMException{
00261         
00262         log.config("Appending sequences from SequenceML..." );
00263         
00264         //checking for null param!
00265         if(seqML == null){
00266             log.severe("Error! Null was submitted instead of SequenceML!");
00267             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Null was submitted instead of SequenceML!");
00268         }
00269         
00270         //checking the sequenceML
00271         if(!(seqML.validate())){
00272             log.severe("Error! Submitted SequenceML is invalid!");
00273             throw new BioDOMException("Error: Invalid SequenceML!");
00274         }
00275         
00276         //checking for aminoacid sequences...
00277         if(seqML.dom.getElementsByTagName("aminoAcidSequence").getLength() != 0){
00278             log.severe("Error! SequenceML contains aminoAcidSequences!");
00279             throw new BioDOMException("Error! SequenceML contains aminoAcidSequences! This is not allowed!");
00280         }
00281         
00282         //Grabbing all sequence elements
00283         final NodeList sequenceNodes = seqML.dom.getElementsByTagName(SequenceML.ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00284         final ArrayList<String> idList = new ArrayList<String>();
00285         Map curSequenceData = null;
00286         String curSeqID = null;
00287         for(int i = 0; i < sequenceNodes.getLength(); i++){
00288             // creating empty rnastructure element
00289             idList.add(appendEmptyRNAStructure());
00290             // getting sequence ID
00291             curSeqID = ((Element)sequenceNodes.item(i)).getAttributeNS(null,SequenceML.ATT_SEQID); 
00292             // getting data for sequence
00293             curSequenceData = seqML.getSequence(curSeqID);
00294             // appending sequence with data to structure            
00295             this.appendSequence((String)curSequenceData.get("sequence"), 
00296                     curSeqID,(String)curSequenceData.get("name"), 
00297                     (List<String>)curSequenceData.get("synonyms"),
00298                     (String)curSequenceData.get("description"), 
00299                     (Integer)curSequenceData.get("sequenceType") ,idList.get(i));
00300         }
00301         
00302         // return the list of rnastructure ids
00303         return idList;
00304      }

00306     /* (non-Javadoc)
00307      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendSequencesFromFasta(java.lang.String, int)
00308      */
00309     public List<String> appendSequencesFromFasta(final String fasta, final int sequenceType) throws BioDOMException,IOException{
00310         log.config("Appending sequences from Fasta. Fasta : '" + fasta + "'");
00311         //checking the string
00312         if((fasta == null)||(fasta.equals(""))){
00313             log.severe("Error! Empty fasta string or null detected!");
00314             throw new BioDOMException("Empty fasta string! Cannot append any sequences...");
00315         }
00316         
00317         // initialising
00318         final SequenceML seqML = new SequenceML();
00319         seqML.appendFasta(fasta, sequenceType);
00320         final List<String> ids = appendSequencesFromSequenceML(seqML);
00321         return ids;
00322     }

00334  
00335     /*
00336      *  (non-Javadoc)
00337      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendFromDotBracketFasta(java.io.InputStream, int)
00338      */
00339     public List<String> appendFromDotBracketFasta(final Reader dotBracketFasta, final int sequenceType)
00340         throws BioDOMException, IOException {
00341         LineNumberReader br = new LineNumberReader(new BufferedReader(dotBracketFasta));
00342         String line = null;
00343         String id = null;
00344         String description =  null;
00345         String sequence = null;
00346         List<String> structure = new ArrayList<String>();
00347         List<String> idlist = new ArrayList<String>();
00348         
00349         while ((line = br.readLine())!= null){
00350             //System.out.println(line);
00351             if (line.equals("")) {
00352                 // skip empty line! exception otherwise!
00353                 log.warning("Empty line detected. Skipping empty line!");
00354                 warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Empty line (line :"+br.getLineNumber()+"detected. Skipping empty line!");
00355             } else {
00356                 /* if line does NOT start with ">"
00357                    assuming it's contains sequence or dotbracket information
00358                    information */  
00359                 if (line.charAt(0) != '>') { // 
00360                     if (id != null) {
00361                         /* if Pattern rnastructPattern matches, assuming it contains
00362                          * RNAStructureInformation 
00363                          */
00364                         if (rnastructPattern.matcher(line).matches()) {
00365                             structure.add(line);
00366                             /* if Pattern rnastructWithEnergyPattern matches, assuming it contains
00367                              * RNAStructureInformation with Energy values
00368                              */
00369                         } else if (rnastructWithEnergyPattern.matcher(line).matches()){
00370                             structure.add(line);
00371                             
00372                             /* else it must be sequence content */    
00373                         }  else {               
00374                             if (sequence == null) {
00375                                 sequence = line;
00376                             } else {
00377                                 throw new BioDOMException("line "+br.getLineNumber()+": More than one sequence content line per id detected.");
00378                             }
00379                         }           
00380                     } else {
00381                         throw new BioDOMException("line " + br.getLineNumber() + ": No id before structure/sequence starts!");
00382                     }
00383                 /* line start with ">" or it is the last line
00384                    if any id exists, we've parsed an sequence before and can
00385                    add it to current dom */
00386                 } else { 
00387                     if (id != null) {
00388                         String ID = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00389                         if (sequence != null) {
00390                             appendSequence(sequence,id,description,sequenceType,ID);                           
00391                         }
00392                         if (structure.size() > 0) {
00393                             for (String struct : structure){
00394                                 if (rnastructWithEnergyPattern.matcher(struct).matches()){
00395                                     // remove leading and ending whitespaces
00396                                     struct = struct.trim();
00397                                     // remove double blanks
00398                                     struct.replaceAll("\\s+"," ");
00399                                     String [] structenergy = struct.split(" ");
00400                                     appendStructure(structenergy[0],Double.parseDouble(structenergy[1]),ID);
00401                                 } else {
00402                                     appendStructure(struct,ID);
00403                                 }
00404                             
00405                             
00406                             }  
00407                         } else {
00408                             throw new BioDOMException("line "+br.getLineNumber()+": No structure information before next structure starts!");
00409                         }
00410                         idlist.add(ID);
00411                     }
00412                     // removing leading whitespaces and get id and description
00413                     final String[] idDesc = line.substring(1).trim().split(" ", 2);
00414                     // get id
00415                     if (idDesc.length > 0) {
00416                         id = idDesc[0];
00417                     } else {
00418                         id = generateId();
00419                         warningBox.appendWarning(this, "line " + br.getLineNumber()
00420                                 + ": Structure/Sequence has no ID! Creating a unique ID!\n");
00421                     }
00422                     // get description if given
00423                     if (idDesc.length > 1) {
00424                         description = idDesc[1];
00425                     } else {
00426                         description = null;
00427                     }
00428                     // clear structure list
00429                     structure.clear();
00430                     // clear sequence
00431                     sequence = null; 
00432                 }
00433             }
00434         }
00435         br.close();
00436         //process last entry
00437         if (id != null) {
00438             String ID = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00439             if (sequence != null) {
00440                 appendSequence(sequence,id,description,sequenceType,ID);                           
00441             }
00442             if (structure.size() > 0) {
00443                 for (String struct : structure){
00444                     if (rnastructWithEnergyPattern.matcher(struct).matches()){
00445                         // remove leading and ending whitespaces
00446                         struct = struct.trim();
00447                         // remove double blanks
00448                         struct.replaceAll("\\s+"," ");
00449                         String [] structenergy = struct.split(" ");
00450                         appendStructure(structenergy[0],Double.parseDouble(structenergy[1]),ID);
00451                     } else {
00452                         appendStructure(struct,ID);
00453                     }
00454                 
00455                 
00456                 }  
00457             } else {
00458                 throw new BioDOMException("line "+br.getLineNumber()+": No structure information before next structure starts!");
00459             }
00460             idlist.add(ID);
00461         }
00462         
00463         return idlist;
00464     }

00484     /* (non-Javadoc)
00485      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#addToNewRNAStructure(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Double, java.lang.String, java.lang.Double, java.lang.Double)
00486      */
00487     public String addToNewRNAStructure(final String rnasequence, final String seqId,
00488             final String description, final int sequenceType, final String program, final String command, final String version,
00489             final String date, final String comment, final String shape, final Double shapeProb,
00490             final String structure, final Double structProb, final Double energy) throws BioDOMException {
00491         log.config("Called method addToNewRNAStructure...");
00492         // creating new rnastructure element
00493         final String rnastructureId = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00494 
00495         // sequence element
00496         if (rnasequence != null) {
00497             appendSequence(rnasequence, seqId, description, sequenceType,
00498                             rnastructureId);
00499         }
00500 
00501         // comment element
00502         if (comment != null) {
00503             appendComment(comment, rnastructureId);
00504         }
00505 
00506         // shape element
00507         String shaperef = null;
00508         if (shape != null) {
00509             shaperef = appendShape(shape, shapeProb, rnastructureId);
00510         }
00511 
00512         // structure element
00513         if (structure != null) {
00514             appendStructure(structure, structProb, energy, shaperef,
00515                     rnastructureId);
00516         }
00517         
00518         // program element
00519         if (program != null) {
00520             appendProgram(program, command, version, date, rnastructureId);
00521         }
00522 
00523         // returning rnastructure id
00524         log.config("Returning rnastructureId :'" + rnastructureId + "'");
00525         return rnastructureId;
00526     }

00554     
00555     /* (non-Javadoc)
00556      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendShape(java.lang.String, java.lang.Double, java.lang.String)
00557      */
00558     public String appendShape(final String shape, final Double shapeProb,
00559             String rnastructure_id, String shapeId) throws BioDOMException{
00560         log.config("Called appendShape. Arguments : '" + shape + "'/'" + shapeProb +"'/'" + rnastructure_id + "'");
00561         // checking if shape is syntactical correct
00562         if(!checkShape(shape)){
00563             log.severe("Shape '" + shape + "' is invalid!");
00564             throw new BioDOMException("Shape + '" + shape + "' is invalid!");
00565         }
00566         // get the correct rnastructure element, create a new one if no id was
00567         // given
00568         if (rnastructure_id == null) {
00569             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No rnastructure id given while appending shape '" + shape + "'! Creating new rnastructure element.");
00570             rnastructure_id = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00571         }else{
00572             // check if this shape does already exist in the given rnastructure
00573             if(rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
00574                 final Hashtable<String, Hashtable<String, Object>> superHash = rnastructureHash.get(rnastructure_id); 
00575                 final Hashtable<String, Object> shapes = superHash.get(SHAPESHASHNAME);
00576                 if(shapes.containsKey(shape)){
00577                     // return the id... shape is already in the rnastructure
00578                     return (String)shapes.get(shape);
00579                 }
00580             }else{
00581                 // fatal error
00582                 log.severe("Rnastructure_id not contained in Hash! Fatal Error! Id : '" + rnastructure_id + "'");
00583                 throw new BioDOMException("Referencing an invalid rnastructure : '" + rnastructure_id +"'");
00584             }
00585         }
00586         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(
00587                 rnastructure_id);
00588 
00589         // construct shape element
00590         final Element shapeElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SHAPE);
00591         shapeElem.setTextContent(shape);
00592 
00593         // setting attributes that are not empty
00594         if (shapeProb != null) {
00595             shapeElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_PROBABILITY, shapeProb.toString());
00596         }
00597         if (shapeId == null) {
00598             shapeId = generateId();
00599             log.info("Create new shape id "+shapeId);
00600         }
00601         shapeElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, shapeId);
00602         shapeElem.setIdAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, true);
00603 
00604         // adding shape to rnastructure
00605         final NodeList tmpProgramNode = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_PROGRAM);
00606         if((tmpProgramNode != null) && (tmpProgramNode.getLength() > 0)){
00607             // there is a program element in the rnastructure element
00608             // elements have to be rearangend so program element is last
00609           final Node removedProgram = rnastructureElem.removeChild(tmpProgramNode.item(0));
00610             rnastructureElem.appendChild(shapeElem);
00611             rnastructureElem.appendChild(removedProgram);
00612         }else{
00613             // no program element, no need to rearange elements
00614             rnastructureElem.appendChild(shapeElem);
00615         }
00616         
00617         // adding shape to hash...
00618         final Hashtable<String, Hashtable<String, String>> superHash = rnastructureHash.get(rnastructure_id);
00619         final Hashtable<String,String> elementHash = superHash.get(SHAPESHASHNAME);
00620         elementHash.put(shape, shapeId); //shape is the id in the hash NOT the id... ;)
00621         
00622         // returning shape_id
00623         log.config("Returning shapeId : '" + shapeId + "'");
00624         return shapeId;
00625     }

00663     /* (non-Javadoc)
00664      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendStructure(java.lang.String, java.lang.Double, java.lang.Double, java.lang.String)
00665      */
00666     public void appendStructure(final String dotBracket, final Double structProb,
00667         final Double energy, final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00668         appendStructure(dotBracket, structProb, energy, null,
00669                 rnastructure_id);
00670     }

00672     /* (non-Javadoc)
00673      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendStructure(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00674      */
00675     public void appendStructure(final String dotBracket, final String shaperef,
00676         final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00677         appendStructure(dotBracket, null, null, shaperef, rnastructure_id);
00678     }
00679 
00680     /* (non-Javadoc)
00681      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendStructure(java.lang.String, java.lang.Double, java.lang.Double, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00682      */
00683     public void appendStructure(final String dotBracket, final Double structProb,
00684         final Double energy, final String shaperef, String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00685         log.config("Called appendStructure. Arguments : '" + dotBracket + "'/'" + structProb + "'/'" + energy + "'/'" + shaperef + "'/'" + rnastructure_id + "'");
00686         
00687         // check if the structure is syntactical correct
00688         if(!checkDotbracket(dotBracket)){
00689             log.severe("Error: Cannot create structure element. Dotbracket sting is not valid!");
00690             throw new BioDOMException("Cannot create structure element. '" + dotBracket + "' is no valid dotbracket structure!");
00691         }
00692         
00693         // get the correct rnastructure element, create a new one if no id was
00694         // given
00695         if (rnastructure_id == null) {
00696             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No rnastructure id given while appending structure '" + dotBracket + "'! Creating new rnastructure element.");
00697             rnastructure_id = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00698         }else{
00699             // check if this shape does already exist in the given rnastructure
00700             if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
00701                 log.severe("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00702                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00703             }
00704         }
00705         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);                                   
00706 
00707         // construct structure element
00708         final Element structureElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_STRUCTURE);
00709         structureElem.setTextContent(dotBracket); // this one is required!
00710 
00711         // adding all attributes that are not empty
00712         if (structProb != null) {
00713             structureElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_PROBABILITY, structProb.toString());
00714         }
00715         if (energy != null) {
00716             structureElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_ENERGY, energy.toString());
00717         }
00718         if (shaperef != null) {
00719             structureElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_SHAPEREF, shaperef);
00720         }
00721 
00722         // adding structure to rnastructure
00723         final NodeList tmpProgramNode = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_PROGRAM);
00724         if((tmpProgramNode != null) && (tmpProgramNode.getLength() != 0)){
00725             // there is a program element in the rnastructure element
00726             // elements have to be rearangend so program element is last
00727           final Node removedProgramNode = rnastructureElem.removeChild(tmpProgramNode.item(0));
00728             rnastructureElem.appendChild(structureElem);
00729             rnastructureElem.appendChild(removedProgramNode);
00730         }else{
00731             // no program element, no need to rearange elements
00732             rnastructureElem.appendChild(structureElem);
00733         }
00734         
00735         log.config("Finished appendStructure...");
00736     }
00737

00742         this.appendSequence(rnasequence, null, null, null, null, sequenceType,null);

00760     /* (non-Javadoc)
00761      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendSequence(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String)
00762      */

00768     /* (non-Javadoc)
00769      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendSequence(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String)
00770      */
00771     public void appendSequence(final String rnasequence, final String seqId, final String sequencename,
00772         final String description, final int sequenceType, final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00773         this.appendSequence(rnasequence, seqId, sequencename, null, description, sequenceType, rnastructure_id);

00776     
00777     /* (non-Javadoc)
00778      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendSequence(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.util.List<String>, java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String)
00779      */
00780     public void appendSequence(final String rnasequence, String seqId, 
00781         final String sequencename, final List<String> synonyms, final String description, 
00782         final int sequenceType, String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00783         log.config("Called appendSequence. Arguments : '" + rnasequence + "'/'" + seqId + "'/'" + description + "'/'" + rnastructure_id +"'");
00784         
00785         // check for invalid sequence data
00786         if(((rnasequence == null)||(rnasequence.equals("")))&&(sequenceType != EMPTYSEQUENCE)){
00787             log.severe("Error! Empty sequence given while using sequenceType " + sequenceType + "!");
00788             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Empty sequence given while using sequenceType " + sequenceType + "!");
00789         }
00790 
00791         // get the correct rnastructure element, create a new one if no id was
00792         // given
00793         if (rnastructure_id == null) {
00794             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No rnastructure id given while appending sequence '" + rnasequence + "'! Creating new rnastructure element.");
00795             rnastructure_id = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00796         }else{
00797             // check if this shape does already exist in the given rnastructure
00798             if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
00799                 log.severe("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00800                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00801             }
00802         }
00803         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
00804 
00805         // construct sequence element
00806         final Element sequenceElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00807         
00808         // add the name element
00809         if (sequencename != null) {
00810           final Element nameElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NAME);
00811             nameElem.setTextContent(sequencename);
00812             sequenceElem.appendChild(nameElem);
00813         }
00814         
00815         // add the synonyms
00816         if(synonyms != null){
00817             for(int i = 0; i < synonyms.size(); i++){
00818               final Element synonymElement = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SYNONYMS);
00819                 synonymElement.setTextContent(synonyms.get(i));
00820                 sequenceElem.appendChild(synonymElement);
00821             }
00822         }
00823         
00824         // add description element
00825         if (description != null) {
00826           final Element descriptionElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION);
00827             descriptionElem.setTextContent(description);
00828             sequenceElem.appendChild(descriptionElem);
00829         }
00830 
00831         // add the sequence
00832         if(sequenceType == NUCLEICACID){
00833             // nucleic Sequence
00834           final Element nucleicSeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
00835             nucleicSeqElem.setTextContent(rnasequence.toUpperCase());
00836             sequenceElem.appendChild(nucleicSeqElem);
00837         }else if(sequenceType == FREE){
00838             // free sequence
00839           final Element freeSeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_FREESEQUENCE);
00840             freeSeqElem.setTextContent(rnasequence.toUpperCase());
00841             sequenceElem.appendChild(freeSeqElem);
00842         }else{
00843             //empty sequence
00844           final Element emptySeqElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_EMPTYSEQUENCE);
00845             sequenceElem.appendChild(emptySeqElem);
00846         }
00847 
00848         // adding attributes that are not empty
00849         if (seqId != null) {
00850             sequenceElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID, seqId);
00851         }else{
00852             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No sequence id given while appending sequence '" + rnasequence + "'! Generating new id.");
00853             seqId = generateId();
00854             sequenceElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID, seqId);
00855         }
00856         final Hashtable superHash = rnastructureHash.get(rnastructure_id);
00857         final Hashtable seqHash = (Hashtable)superHash.get(SEQUENCEHASHNAME);
00858         //here we check for double sequence IDs and throw an exception if we find doubles
00859         if(seqHash.containsKey(seqId)){
00860             log.config("Error! Double seqId! '" + seqId + "'");
00861             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Double sequence id! SeqId: '" + seqId + "'");
00862         }
00863         //otherwise, all is well and we can add this sequence  ID
00864         seqHash.put(seqId, sequenceType);
00865 
00866         // adding sequence to rnastructure
00867         if(rnastructureElem.getFirstChild() != null){
00868             rnastructureElem.insertBefore(sequenceElem, rnastructureElem.getFirstChild());
00869         }else{
00870             rnastructureElem.appendChild(sequenceElem);
00871         }
00872         log.config("appendSequence finished successful...");
00873     }

00890     /* (non-Javadoc)
00891      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendProgram(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00892      */
00893     public void appendProgram(final String program, final String command, final String version,
00894         final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00895         this.appendProgram(program, command, version, null, rnastructure_id);
00896     }
00897 
00898     /* (non-Javadoc)
00899      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendProgram(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00900      */
00901     public void appendProgram(final String program, final String command, final String version,
00902         final String date, String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00903         log.config("Called appendProgram. Argument : '" + program + "'/'" + command + "'/'" + version + "'/'" + date + "'/'" +rnastructure_id + "'");
00904         // get the correct rnastructure element, create a new one if no id was
00905         // given
00906         if (rnastructure_id == null) {
00907             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No rnastructure id given while appending program element! Creating new rnastructure element.");
00908             rnastructure_id = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00909         }else{
00910             // check if this shape does already exist in the given rnastructure
00911             if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
00912                 log.severe("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00913                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00914             }
00915         }
00916         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
00917 
00918         // constructing program element
00919         final Element programElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_PROGRAM);
00920         programElem.setTextContent(program);
00921 
00922         // adding the attributes that are not empty
00923         if (command != null) {
00924             programElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_COMMAND, command);
00925         }
00926         if (version != null) {
00927             programElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_VERSION, version);
00928         }
00929         if (date != null) { 
00930             if(!checkDate(date)){
00931                 log.severe("Date invalid : '" + date + "'");
00932                 throw new BioDOMException("Invalid date string submitted: '" + date + "'! Format YYYY-MM-DD required!");
00933             }
00934             programElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_DATE, date);
00935         }
00936 
00937         // adding program to rnastructure
00938         rnastructureElem.appendChild(programElem);
00939         log.config("Finished appendProgram ...");
00940     }

00942     /* (non-Javadoc)
00943      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendComment(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
00944      */
00945     public void appendComment(final String comment, String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
00946         log.config("Called appendComment. Arguments :'" + comment + "'/'" + rnastructure_id + "'");
00947         // get the correct rnastructure element, create a new one if no id was
00948         // given
00949         if (rnastructure_id == null) {
00950             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "No rnastructure id given while appending comment '" + comment + "'! Creating new rnastructure element.");
00951             rnastructure_id = appendEmptyRNAStructure();
00952         }else{
00953             // check if this shape does already exist in the given rnastructure
00954             if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
00955                 log.severe("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00956                 throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id +"' does not exist!");
00957             }
00958         }
00959         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
00960 
00961         // constructing the comment
00962         final Element commentElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_COMMENT);
00963         commentElem.setTextContent(comment);
00964 
00965         // adding comment to rnastructure
00966         if(rnastructureElem.getFirstChild() != null){
00967             rnastructureElem.insertBefore(commentElem, rnastructureElem.getFirstChild());
00968             final NodeList tmpSequenceNodeList = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SEQUENCE);
00969             if((tmpSequenceNodeList!=null)&&(tmpSequenceNodeList.getLength() > 0)){
00970               final Node tmpSequenceNode = rnastructureElem.removeChild(tmpSequenceNodeList.item(0));
00971                 rnastructureElem.insertBefore(tmpSequenceNode, commentElem);
00972             }
00973         }else{        
00974             rnastructureElem.appendChild(commentElem);
00975         }
00976         log.config("Finished appendComment...");
00977     }

00979     /* (non-Javadoc)
00980      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#appendEmptyRNAStructure()
00981      */
00982     public String appendEmptyRNAStructure() {
00983         log.config("Called appendEmptyRNAStructure...");
00984         // creates an empty rnastructure element
00985         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_RNASTRUCTURE);
00986         log.config("Created rnastructure element");
00987         final String idString = generateId();
00988         log.config("Generated id");
00989         rnastructureElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, idString);
00990         log.config("Id attribute set");
00991         rnastructureElem.setIdAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, true);                
00992         log.config("Id attribute declared to be an id..");
00993         final Element rootElem = dom.getDocumentElement();
00994         log.config("Adding rnastructure to the rootelement");
00995         rootElem.appendChild(rnastructureElem);
00996         // adding id to hash
00997         final Hashtable<String, Hashtable> superHash = new Hashtable<String, Hashtable>();
00998         final Hashtable sequenceHash = new Hashtable();
00999         final Hashtable shapesHash = new Hashtable();
01000         superHash.put(SEQUENCEHASHNAME, sequenceHash);
01001         superHash.put(SHAPESHASHNAME, shapesHash);
01002         rnastructureHash.put(idString, superHash);
01003         log.config("Returning rnastructureId : '" + idString + "'");
01004         return idString;
01005     }
01006 
01007     /*
01008      *  (non-Javadoc)
01009      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#toDotBracketFasta()
01010      */
01011     public String toDotBracketFasta() throws BioDOMException{
01012         StringBuffer retDotBracketFasta = new StringBuffer();
01013         final List<String> rnastructures = getRnastructureIds();
01014         for(String rnastructure : rnastructures){
01015             final Hashtable<String, Object> sequence = getSequence(rnastructure);
01016             final List<Hashtable<String, Object>> structures = getStructures(rnastructure);
01017 
01018             // start with fasta header
01019             retDotBracketFasta.append('>');
01020             // check if this structure have a sequence;
01021             if (sequence != null) {
01022                 // build complete header 
01023             
01024                 StringBuffer header = new StringBuffer();
01025                 if ( sequence.containsKey("seqID")) {
01026                     header.append(sequence.get("seqID"));
01027                 }
01028                 if ( sequence.containsKey("name")) {
01029                     header.append(' ').append(sequence.get("name"));
01030                 }
01031                 if ( sequence.containsKey("description")) {
01032                     header.append(' ').append(sequence.get("description"));
01033                 }
01034                 // and add it
01035                 retDotBracketFasta.append(header).append(LINEBREAK);
01036                 // add sequence data
01037                 retDotBracketFasta.append(sequence.get("sequence"));
01038             }
01039             retDotBracketFasta.append(LINEBREAK);
01040             
01041             
01042             for(Hashtable structure : structures){
01043                 if(structure.containsKey("structure")){
01044                     retDotBracketFasta.append(structure.get("structure"));
01045                     if (structure.get("energy") != null){
01046                         retDotBracketFasta.append(' ').append(structure.get("energy"));
01047                     }    
01048                     retDotBracketFasta.append(LINEBREAK);
01049                 }else{
01050                     log.severe("Error! Missing structure key in hashtable!");
01051                     throw new BioDOMException("Error! Missing structure key in hashtable!");
01052                 }
01053             }
01054             
01055         }
01056         return retDotBracketFasta.toString();
01057     }
01058     
01062     
01063     /* (non-Javadoc)
01064      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getLastRnastructureId()
01065      */
01066     public String getLastRnastructureId() throws BioDOMException{
01067         try{
01068             log.config("Called getLastRnastructureId...");
01069             final NodeList rnastructureElemNodes = dom.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_RNASTRUCTURE);
01070             
01071             //check for empty rnastructureElemNodes
01072             if ((rnastructureElemNodes == null) || (rnastructureElemNodes.getLength() == 0)) {
01073                 log.config("There is no last rnastructure element! Returning null!");
01074                 return null;
01075             }
01076             //if we reach this point, the last check was ok and we can return the attribute's ID
01077           final Element rnastructureElem = (Element)rnastructureElemNodes.item(rnastructureElemNodes.getLength()-1);
01078             log.config("Returning id : '" + rnastructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID) + "'");
01079             return rnastructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID);     
01080         }catch(Exception e){
01081             log.severe("An Exception occured while trying to getLastRnastructureId :" + e.getMessage());
01082             throw new BioDOMException("An Exception occured while trying to getLastRnastructureId :" + e.getMessage());
01083         }
01084     }
01085     
01086     /* (non-Javadoc)
01087      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getRnastructureIds()
01088      */
01089     public List<String> getRnastructureIds(){
01090         log.config("Getting RNAStructure Ids ...");
01091         final NodeList rnastructureNodes = dom.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_RNASTRUCTURE);
01092         log.config("Fetched all rnastructure elements...");
01093         List<String> ids = null;
01094         if((rnastructureNodes != null)&&(rnastructureNodes.getLength() > 0)){
01095             log.config("Found " + rnastructureNodes.getLength() + " elements ...");
01096             ids = new ArrayList<String>();
01097             for(int i =0; i < rnastructureNodes.getLength(); i++){
01098                 log.config("Casting item " + i);
01099                 final Element tmpElem = (Element)rnastructureNodes.item(i);
01100                 log.config("Fetching attribute item " + i);
01101                 ids.add(tmpElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID));
01102             }
01103         }else{
01104             log.severe("Error! No rnastructure elements in DOM...");
01105             return null;
01106         }
01107         log.config("Done. Returning idArray...");
01108         return ids;
01109     }
01110     
01111     /* (non-Javadoc)
01112      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getSequenceIds(java.lang.String)
01113      */
01114     public List<String> getSequenceIds(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01115         if(rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01116           final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01117           final NodeList sequenceNodes = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SEQUENCE);
01118             List<String> ids = null;
01119             if((sequenceNodes != null)&&(sequenceNodes.getLength() > 0)){
01120                 ids = new ArrayList<String>();
01121                 for(int i =0; i < sequenceNodes.getLength(); i++){
01122                   final Element tmpElem = (Element)sequenceNodes.item(i);
01123                     ids.add(tmpElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID));
01124                 }
01125             }else{
01126                 log.config("No sequence elements in DOM...");
01127                 ids = null;
01128             }
01129             return ids;
01130         }
01131         //if we reach this point, no fitting ID was found, so we log an errot and throw an exception
01132         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01133         throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01134     }
01135     
01136     /* (non-Javadoc)
01137      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getSequence(java.lang.String)
01138      */
01139     public Hashtable<String, Object> getSequence(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01140         log.config("Called getSequence with rnastructure id : " + rnastructure_id);
01141         
01142         //first, we check if the given id is present. If nt, we log an error and throw an exception...
01143         if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01144             log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01145             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01146         }
01147         //...otherwise, we process the request
01148         
01149         // get the correct rnastructure_id
01150         final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01151         
01152         // get the correct sequence element
01153         final NodeList sequenceNodes = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SEQUENCE);
01154         Element sequenceElem = null;
01155         if((sequenceNodes != null)&&(sequenceNodes.getLength() > 0)){
01156           log.config("Found a sequence element...");
01157           sequenceElem = (Element)sequenceNodes.item(0);
01158         }else{
01159           // no sequence element in rnastructml element
01160           log.config("No sequence element found in rnastructure element... Are you sure, that you are refering to the correct rnastructure element?");
01161           return null;
01162         }
01163         
01164         //extract information from the sequence element
01165         final Hashtable<String, Object> sequenceHash = new Hashtable<String, Object>();
01166         
01167         // attributes
01168         if(sequenceElem.hasAttribute(ATT_SEQID)){
01169           sequenceHash.put("seqID", sequenceElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID));
01170         }
01171         // name element
01172         NodeList tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NAME);
01173         if(tmpList.getLength() > 0){
01174           sequenceHash.put("name", ((Element)tmpList.item(0)).getTextContent());
01175         }
01176         
01177         // synonyms
01178         tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_SYNONYMS);
01179         if(tmpList.getLength() > 0){
01180           final ArrayList<String> synonyms = new ArrayList<String>();
01181           for(int j = 0; j < tmpList.getLength(); j++){
01182             synonyms.add(((Element)tmpList.item(j)).getTextContent());
01183           }
01184           sequenceHash.put("synonyms", synonyms.toArray(new String[synonyms.size()]));
01185         }
01186         
01187         // description element
01188         tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_DESCRIPTION);
01189         if(tmpList.getLength() > 0){
01190           sequenceHash.put("description", ((Element)tmpList.item(0)).getTextContent());
01191         }
01192         
01193         // the sequences
01194         tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
01195         if(tmpList.getLength()>0){
01196           sequenceHash.put("sequence", ((Element)tmpList.item(0)).getTextContent());
01197           sequenceHash.put("sequenceType", NUCLEICACID);
01198           sequenceHash.put("sequenceTypeName", NUCLEICACID_NAME);
01199         }else{
01200           tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_FREESEQUENCE);
01201           if(tmpList.getLength() > 0){
01202             sequenceHash.put("sequence", ((Element)tmpList.item(0)).getTextContent());
01203             sequenceHash.put("sequenceType", FREE);
01204             sequenceHash.put("sequenceTypeName", FREESEQUENCE_NAME);
01205           }else{
01206             sequenceHash.put("sequenceType", EMPTYSEQUENCE);
01207             sequenceHash.put("sequenceTypeName", EMPTYSEQUENCE_NAME);
01208           }
01209         }
01210         
01211         // crossrefs
01212         // TODO
01213         
01214         // comment
01215         tmpList = sequenceElem.getElementsByTagNameNS(NAMESPACE,ELEM_COMMENT);
01216         if(tmpList.getLength() > 0){
01217           sequenceHash.put("comment", tmpList.item(0).getTextContent());
01218         }
01219         // return the result
01220         return sequenceHash;
01221     }

01223     /* (non-Javadoc)
01224      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getProgram(java.lang.String)
01225      */
01226     public Hashtable<String, String> getProgram(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01227       // First, we check if the ID of the requested program is present in our document
01228       // If it is not, we log an error and throw an exception...
01229       if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01230         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01231             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01232         }
01233       // ...otherwise, we can process this request: 
01234       final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01235       final NodeList programNodes = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_PROGRAM);
01236       // Here, we check if there are any programNodes present in our document.
01237       // If there aren't any, we log a debug message and return null...
01238       if((programNodes == null) || (programNodes.getLength() == 0)){
01239         log.config("No program element found in rnastructure id '" + rnastructure_id + "' ... Returning null!");
01240         return null;
01241       }
01242       //...otherwise, we continue processing this request and return the program hash in the end
01243       final Element programElem = (Element)programNodes.item(0);
01244       final Hashtable<String, String> programHash = new Hashtable<String, String>();
01245       // programname
01246       String tmpValue = programElem.getTextContent();
01247       if((tmpValue != null)&&(!tmpValue.equals(""))){
01248         programHash.put("programname", tmpValue);
01249       }
01250       // command
01251       tmpValue = programElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_COMMAND);
01252       if((tmpValue != null)&&(!tmpValue.equals(""))){
01253         programHash.put("command", tmpValue);
01254       }
01255       // version
01256       tmpValue = programElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_VERSION);
01257       if((tmpValue != null)&&(!tmpValue.equals(""))){
01258         programHash.put("version", tmpValue);
01259       }
01260       // date
01261       tmpValue = programElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_DATE);
01262       if((tmpValue != null)&&(!tmpValue.equals(""))){
01263         programHash.put("date", tmpValue);
01264       }
01265       return programHash;
01266     }

01271     public String getComment(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01272       // First, we check if the ID of the requested comment is present
01273       // If it is not, we log an error and throw an exception...
01274       if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01275         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01276         throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01277       }
01278       // ...otherwise, we extract the comment as requested
01279       final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01280       final NodeList commentNodeList = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_COMMENT);
01281       String comment = null;
01282       if((commentNodeList != null)&&(commentNodeList.getLength()>0)){
01283         final Element tmpElem = (Element)commentNodeList.item(0);
01284         comment = tmpElem.getTextContent();
01285       }else{
01286         log.config("No comment elements in DOM...");
01287       }
01288       return comment;

01291     /* (non-Javadoc)
01292      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getStructures(java.lang.String)
01293      */
01294     public List<Hashtable<String, Object>> getStructures(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01295       // First, we check if the ID of the requested comment is present
01296       // If it is not, we log an error and throw an exception...
01297       if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01298         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01299         throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01300       }
01301       // ...otherwise, we can process this request: 
01302       final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01303       final NodeList structureNodeList = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_STRUCTURE);
01304       // Here, we check if there are any structureNodes present
01305       // If there aren't any, we log a debug message and return null...
01306       if((structureNodeList == null) || (structureNodeList.getLength() == 0)){
01307         log.config("No such element: structure! rnastructure_id : '" + rnastructure_id + "'");
01308         return null;
01309       }
01310       // ...otherwise, we continue processing this request and return the requested data
01311       final List<Hashtable<String, Object>> retHashArray = new ArrayList<Hashtable<String, Object>>();
01312       Element tmpStructureElem;
01313       for(int i = 0; i < structureNodeList.getLength(); i++){
01314         retHashArray.add(new Hashtable<String, Object>());
01315         tmpStructureElem = (Element)structureNodeList.item(i);
01316         // shapeType
01317         (retHashArray.get(i)).put("shapeType", "structure");
01318         // structure
01319         String tmpString = tmpStructureElem.getTextContent();
01320         if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01321           (retHashArray.get(i)).put("structure", tmpString);
01322         }
01323         // energy
01324         if(tmpStructureElem.hasAttribute(ATT_ENERGY)){
01325           final Double tmpDouble = Double.valueOf(tmpStructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ENERGY));
01326           if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01327             (retHashArray.get(i)).put("energy", tmpDouble);
01328           }
01329         }
01330         // probability
01331         if(tmpStructureElem.hasAttribute(ATT_PROBABILITY)){
01332           final Double tmpDouble = Double.valueOf(tmpStructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_PROBABILITY));
01333           if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01334             (retHashArray.get(i)).put("probability", tmpDouble);
01335           }
01336         }
01337         // shaperef
01338         if(tmpStructureElem.hasAttribute(ATT_SHAPEREF)){
01339           tmpString = tmpStructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SHAPEREF);
01340           if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01341             (retHashArray.get(i)).put("shaperef", tmpString);
01342           }
01343         }
01344       }
01345       // return filled hasharray
01346       return retHashArray;
01347     }

01352     public List<Hashtable<String, Object>> getShapes(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01353       // First, we check if the ID of the requested shapes is present
01354       // If it is not, we log an error and throw an exception...
01355       if(!rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){     
01356         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01357         throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01358       }     
01359       // ...otherwise, we can process this request: 
01360       final Element rnastructureElem = dom.getElementById(rnastructure_id);
01361       final NodeList shapeNodeList = rnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SHAPE);
01362       // Here, we check if there are any shapeNodes present
01363       // If there aren't any, we log a debug message and return null...
01364       if((shapeNodeList == null) || (shapeNodeList.getLength() == 0)){
01365         log.config("No shapes in rnastructure element with id : '" + rnastructure_id + "'");
01366         return null;
01367       }
01368       // ...otherwise, we continue processing this request and return the requested data
01369       final ArrayList<Hashtable<String, Object>> retHashArray = new ArrayList<Hashtable<String, Object>>();
01370       Element tmpShapeElem;
01371       for(int i = 0; i < shapeNodeList.getLength(); i++){
01372         retHashArray.add(new Hashtable<String, Object>());
01373         tmpShapeElem = (Element)shapeNodeList.item(i);
01374         // shapeType
01375         (retHashArray.get(i)).put("shapeType", "shape");
01376         // shape
01377         String tmpString = tmpShapeElem.getTextContent();
01378         if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01379           (retHashArray.get(i)).put("shape", tmpString);
01380         }
01381         // probability
01382         if(tmpShapeElem.hasAttribute(ATT_PROBABILITY)){
01383           final Double tmpDouble = Double.valueOf(tmpShapeElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_PROBABILITY));
01384           if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01385             (retHashArray.get(i)).put("probability", tmpDouble);
01386           }
01387         }
01388         // id
01389         if(tmpShapeElem.hasAttribute(ATT_ID)){
01390           tmpString = tmpShapeElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID);
01391           if((tmpString != null)&&(!tmpString.equals(""))){
01392             (retHashArray.get(i)).put("id", tmpString);
01393           }
01394         }
01395       }
01396       // return filled hasharray
01397       return retHashArray;
01398     }

01400     /* (non-Javadoc)
01401      * @see de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.RNAStructMLInterface#getStructuresAndShapes(java.lang.String)
01402      */
01403     public Hashtable<String, List<Hashtable<String, Object>>> getStructuresAndShapes(final String rnastructure_id) throws BioDOMException{
01404         if(rnastructureHash.containsKey(rnastructure_id)){
01405           final List<Hashtable<String, Object>> shapesHashArray = getShapes(rnastructure_id);
01406           final List<Hashtable<String, Object>> structuresHashArray = getStructures(rnastructure_id);
01407           final Hashtable<String, List<Hashtable<String, Object>>> shapesAndStructuresHash = new Hashtable<String, List<Hashtable<String, Object>>>();
01408             
01409             if(shapesHashArray != null){
01410                 shapesAndStructuresHash.put("shapes", shapesHashArray);
01411             }
01412             if(structuresHashArray != null){
01413                 shapesAndStructuresHash.put("structures", structuresHashArray);
01414             }
01415             return shapesAndStructuresHash; 
01416         }
01417         // If we reach this point, there was no fitting rnastructure_id in the rnastructureHash.
01418         // Therefore, we log an error and throw an exception
01419         log.severe("Error: rnastructure id not found in DOM :" + rnastructure_id);
01420         throw new BioDOMException("Error! Given rnastructure id not found in document! " + rnastructure_id);
01421     }

01429     private void initDOM() {   
01430         dom = DB.newDocument();
01431         final Element root = dom.createElementNS(NAMESPACE, ELEM_RNASTRUCTML);
01432         root.setAttributeNS(XMLConstants.W3C_XML_SCHEMA_INSTANCE_NS_URI,"schemaLocation", NAMESPACE+" "+NSLOCATION);
01433         dom.appendChild(root);
01434         dom.normalizeDocument();
01435         log.config("DOM ready...");
01436     }

01444     private boolean checkShape(final String shapeString) throws BioDOMException{
01445         return checkStructureOrShape(shapeString, SHAPE);
01446     }
01447     
01453     private boolean checkDotbracket(final String dotbracketString) throws BioDOMException{
01454         return checkStructureOrShape(dotbracketString, STRUCTURE);
01455     }
01456     
01464     private boolean checkStructureOrShape(final String checkString, final int type) throws BioDOMException{
01465         log.config("Checking '" + checkString +"' for syntactical correctness...");
01466         if((checkString == null)||(checkString.equals(""))){
01467             // checks if structure is empty
01468             log.severe("Error: dotbracket string is empty or null!");
01469             return false;
01470         }
01471         final char[] tokens = checkString.toCharArray();
01472         if((type != STRUCTURE)&&(type != SHAPE)){
01473             log.severe("Invalid type used in checkStructureOrShape! Type :'" + type + "'");
01474             throw new BioDOMException("Error! Invalid type in checkStructureOrShape! Type : '" + type + "'");
01475         }
01476         int counterSimple = 0;    // counter for '('-brackets
01477         int counterEdged = 0;     // counter for '['-brackets
01478         int counterTwisted = 0;   // counter for '{'-brackets
01479         int counterPointed = 0;   // counter for '<'-brackets
01480         String currenttoken;
01481 
01482         for(int i = 0; i < tokens.length; i++){
01483             currenttoken = "" + tokens[i];
01484             //log.config("current token : '" + currenttoken + "'");
01485             switch (tokens[i]){
01486                 // incr opening brackets counter
01487                 case '(' :  counterSimple++; break;
01488                 case '[' :  counterEdged++; break;
01489                 case '{' :  counterTwisted++; break;
01490                 case '<' :  counterPointed++; break;
01491                 
01492                 // decr the brackets counter 
01493                 case ')' :  counterSimple--;
01494                             if(counterSimple < 0){
01495                                 // to few opening brackets
01496                                 log.severe("Closing bracket detected when an opening bracket was expected... :'" + currenttoken + "'");
01497                                 return false;
01498                             }
01499                             break;
01500                 case ']' :  counterEdged--;
01501                             if(counterEdged < 0){
01502                                 // to few opening brackets
01503                                 log.severe("Closing bracket detected when an opening bracket was expected... :'" + currenttoken + "'");
01504                                 return false;
01505                             }
01506                             break;
01507                 case '}' :  counterTwisted--;
01508                             if(counterTwisted < 0){
01509                                 // to few opening brackets
01510                                 log.severe("Closing bracket detected when an opening bracket was expected... :'" + currenttoken + "'");
01511                                 return false;
01512                             }
01513                             break;
01514                 case '>' :  counterPointed--;
01515                             if(counterPointed < 0){
01516                                 // to few opening brackets
01517                                 log.severe("Closing bracket detected when an opening bracket was expected... :'" + currenttoken + "'");
01518                                 return false;
01519                             }
01520                             break;
01521                 case '.' :  // ignore case STRUCTURE
01522                             if(type == STRUCTURE) break; 
01523                             //if we reach this point, there is an error and return false...
01524                             log.severe("Invalid symbol detected... (Structure mode) : '" + currenttoken + "'");
01525                             return false;
01526                 case '_' :  // ignore case SHAPE
01527                             if(type == SHAPE) break;
01528 //                          if we reach this point, there is an error and return false...
01529                             log.severe("Invalid symbol detected... (Shape mode): '" + currenttoken + "'");
01530                             return false;
01531                 default  :  // invalid symbol found
01532                             log.severe("Invalid symbol detected... : '" + currenttoken + "'");
01533                             return false;
01534             }
01535         }
01536         if(counterSimple+counterEdged+counterTwisted+counterPointed > 0){
01537             // check if some brackets are still open...
01538             log.severe("To many opening brackets... Structure is not valid!");
01539             return false;
01540         }
01541         log.config("Dotbracket string is valid.");
01542         return true;
01543     }
01544     
01550     private boolean checkDate(final String datestring) {
01551       final Pattern datePattern = Pattern.compile("^\\d\\d\\d\\d-\\d\\d-\\d\\d$");
01552       final Matcher m = datePattern.matcher(datestring);
01553       
01554       //If the datestring matches our pattern, we can do some more checks
01555         if (m.matches()) {
01556           final String monthString = datestring.substring(5, 7);
01557           final String daysString = datestring.substring(8, 10);
01558           final int month = Integer.parseInt(monthString);
01559             final int days = Integer.parseInt(daysString);
01560             //here, we check if the datestring conforms to usual western european calendaring rules for months and days:-)!
01561             //If anything goes wrong here, we return 'false'
01562             if ((month > 12) || (days > 31)) {
01563                 log.severe("Invalid date! Number for month or day to big :" + datestring);
01564                 return false;
01565             }
01566             //If the string passed the last test, it should be a somewhat correct datestring, so we return 'true'
01567             return true;
01568         }
01569       //...otherwise, we can log an error and return 'false'
01570         log.severe("Invalid date! Pattern does not match! : '" + datestring + "'");
01571         return false;
01572     }
01573     
01578     private void generateRnastructureHash() throws BioDOMException{
01579         try{
01580             // adding ids to hash
01581           final NodeList rnastructureNodes = dom.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_RNASTRUCTURE);
01582             Element tmpRnastructureElem = null;
01583             Element tmpSubElem = null;
01584             NodeList tmpNodes = null;
01585             String idString = null;
01586             // evaluating rnastructure by rnastructure
01587             for(int i=0; i < rnastructureNodes.getLength(); i++){
01588                 log.config("Evaluating rnastructure element " + i);
01589                 tmpRnastructureElem = (Element)rnastructureNodes.item(i);
01590                 if(tmpRnastructureElem.hasAttribute("id")){
01591                     log.finer("rnastructure has an id");
01592                     idString = tmpRnastructureElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID);
01593                 } else {
01594                     log.finer("rnastructure has no id");
01595                     idString = null;
01596                 }
01597                 
01598                 // generate the hashes...
01599                 log.config("generate the hashes ...");
01600                 final Hashtable<String,Hashtable<String, Object>> superHash = new Hashtable<String,Hashtable<String, Object>>();
01601                 final Hashtable<String, Object> sequenceHash = new Hashtable<String, Object>();
01602                 final Hashtable<String, Object> shapesHash = new Hashtable<String, Object>();
01603                 
01604                 
01605                 // checking the shapes
01606                 log.config("checking the hashes");
01607                 tmpNodes = tmpRnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SHAPE);
01608                 if((tmpNodes != null)&&(tmpNodes.getLength() > 0)){
01609                     for (int j = 0; j < tmpNodes.getLength(); j++){
01610                         tmpSubElem = (Element)tmpNodes.item(j);
01611                         if(tmpSubElem.hasAttribute(ATT_ID)){
01612                             // has id, just add it
01613                           final String shapeId = tmpSubElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID);
01614                           final String shape = tmpSubElem.getTextContent();
01615                             shapesHash.put(shape, shapeId); // shape is the key, NOT id!
01616                         }else{
01617                             // has no id, generate it...
01618                             warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Shape id missing in document! Generating it.");
01619                             final String shapeId = generateId();
01620                             tmpSubElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, shapeId);
01621                             final String shape = tmpSubElem.getTextContent();
01622                             shapesHash.put(shape, shapeId); // see above
01623                         }
01624                     }
01625                 }
01626                 
01627                 // checking the sequences
01628                 log.config("checking the sequences");
01629                 tmpNodes = tmpRnastructureElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_SEQUENCE);
01630                 if((tmpNodes != null)&&(tmpNodes.getLength()>0)){
01631                     tmpSubElem = (Element)tmpNodes.item(0);
01632                     String seqID = null;
01633                     if(tmpSubElem.hasAttribute(ATT_SEQID)){
01634                         seqID = tmpSubElem.getAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID);
01635                     }else{
01636                         warningBox.appendWarning(this, "Sequence id missing in document! Generating it.");
01637                         seqID = "GENERATEDID_" + generateId();
01638                         tmpSubElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_SEQID, seqID);
01639                     }
01640                     NodeList anotherone = tmpSubElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_NUCLEICACIDSEQUENCE);
01641                     if((anotherone != null)&&(anotherone.getLength() > 0)){
01642                         sequenceHash.put(seqID, NUCLEICACID);
01643                     }else{
01644                         anotherone = tmpSubElem.getElementsByTagName(ELEM_FREESEQUENCE);
01645                         if((anotherone != null)&&(anotherone.getLength() > 0)){
01646                             sequenceHash.put(seqID, FREE);
01647                         }else{
01648                             sequenceHash.put(seqID, EMPTYSEQUENCE);
01649                         }
01650                     }
01651                 }
01652                 
01653                 // add the subhashes to the rnastructure hash
01654                 log.config("add the subhashes to the rnastructure hash");
01655                 superHash.put(SEQUENCEHASHNAME, sequenceHash);
01656                 superHash.put(SHAPESHASHNAME, shapesHash);
01657                 if((idString != null)&&(!idString.equals(""))){
01658                     // id attribute given -> make it an ID
01659                     log.finer("found an id - use it");
01660                     tmpRnastructureElem.setIdAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, true);
01661                     log.config("Found id for rnastructure element : '" + idString + "'. Added to Hash...");
01662                     rnastructureHash.put(idString, superHash);
01663                 }else{
01664                     // no id attribute in rnastructure element -> generate one
01665                     log.finer("id is missing - generate one");
01666                     warningBox.appendWarning(this, "rnastructure id missing in document! Generating it.");
01667                     idString = generateId();
01668                     tmpRnastructureElem.setAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, idString);
01669                     tmpRnastructureElem.setIdAttributeNS(null,ATT_ID, true);
01670                     log.config("Generated id for rnastructure element : '" + idString + "'. Added to Hash...");
01671                     rnastructureHash.put(idString, superHash);
01672                 }
01673             }
01674         } catch (Exception e){
01675             log.severe("Internal Parsing Error! Message :" + e.getMessage());
01676             throw new BioDOMException("Internal Parsing Error! Error message: " + e.getMessage());
01677         }
01678     }
